menuDownloads.info: Any of these menus can be downloaded to your device in PDF format. How quickly they download will be dependant upon your connection speed.
menuDownloads.title: Downloadable Menus

rooms.info: The Plough is a stone-built village pub with an open plan bar and dining room. Step inside and you will find leather chesterfields, open fires, and wooden dining tables. The pub has five comfortable single, double, and twin bedrooms and is within proximity of Bicester Shopping Village. A convenient stop-over for overnight shopping trips or as a base for exploring the Oxfordshire Cotswolds.
rooms.title: Room Reservations
rooms.acknowledgement: Thank you for your enquiry. We will contact you shortly, to discuss your requirement.
